mapper.select: SELECT p.item_name,p.item_code,p.object_name,p.resource_type, p.start_price,p.reserve_price,p.close_price,prin.fee, prin.seq_id,`user`.user_name FROM pb_result_info prin LEFT JOIN `user` ON prin.enter_id=`user`.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT poi.*,pii.item_code,pii.item_name,pii.resource_type FROM pb_object_info poi LEFT JOIN pb_item_info pii ON poi.item_id=pii.item_id ) p ON prin.object_id = p.object_id WHERE prin.flow_id = #{flow}
mapper.update: UPDATE pb_result_info SET flow_id = 3 WHERE seq_id = #{seqId}
